title: Henrique Castro Martins
text:
Which of the following best describes financial distress in a firm?
 A. A temporary decline in the firm’s stock price.  B. A situation where a firm struggles to meet debt obligations or violates covenants.  C. Any reduction in firm profitability.  D. When the firm replaces debt with equity financing.  E. A loss of market share to competitors.


✅ B is correct. Financial distress occurs when a firm cannot fulfill its debt obligations or violates loan covenants.
